content: embrace the art of crochet with our going granny scarf pattern perfect for beginners looking to dive into the world of crochet this oversized scarf boasts a cozy fit that can be customized to suit your style whether you prefer a petite or tall length with clear and concise instructions even novice crocheters can confidently tackle this project and showcase their craftsmanship **unique features-** beginner-friendly crochet pattern oversized fit for added comfort can be customized for petite or tall sizes worked flat in a classic granny stripe design **materials needed-** yarn king cole harvest dk 569 yards hook 4mm us size 6 0 gauge 15 stitches by 10 row = 4 inches in double_crochet worked in pattern for granny stripe **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
